attributes.action: Change the High courts decision too ban The Pirate Bay (TPB) from the UK internet via isp's
attributes.additional_details: I Wish too overturn the High courts decision too block/ban connections too the swedish torrent site The Pirate bay. Limiting what uk citizens can access on the internet is undemocratic and wish this too be brought too the attention of the UK parliament and the decision too be overturned.
